body.name: ONN Dual Dash Cam with Ultra-Wide Angle Lens, 3'' LCD Screen, Front 1080P Wide Angle Camera with 16GB SD Card, Supports 128GB max, Built in G-Sensor (Renewed), Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 34 mins
features: Picture in Picture - record video on the front camera while you can keep an eye on the passengers in the car. The picture in picture image can be easily switched with touch of a key on the camera. Easily select which image to show on each screen.
IR Emitters - Record with the cabin camera even with low light condition
Loop Recording - Will continue to record videos according to the length you select in settings. Seamless loop recording will automatically overwrite old files.
Built-in G-sensor - Supports emergency video file backup when an accident happens.
Built in Battery - While in Parking Mode, the battery will offer up to 3 Minutes recording video with an impact detection
Simple Menu - Easily adjust the settings with the simple menu
Built-in microphone & speaker - Capture & play clear audio & provide versatility in use.
16GB microSD card included - Ensures convenient & long-lasting operation. Supports SD cards up to 128GB.
Windshield mounts - Include suction mount for easy installation
body.description: The ONN dual 3'' LCD dash cam with a 120 degree wide angle lens ensures wider coverage of surroundings, & automatically records 1080p Full HD video while driving & at the same time records what is happening inside the car at 480P resolution. With its IR night vision, the cabin camera captures crisp details day & night. The cabin facing camera will provide additional security solution for recording videos for taxi or shared ride drivers. Loop Recording automatically overwrites the earliest file & records over it when storage fills up. With G-sensor enabled, the dash cam will automatically lock the current footage to prevent video from being overwritten when it detects a sudden shake/collision, which ensure important footage is protected . With the built in variable G-sensor, even when your car is parked, the dash cam will start recording video if your car is impacted (the impact level can be changed in settings) for up to 3 minutes. The Dash cam has a 16GB micro SD card included & supports additional cards with up to 128 GB of capacity. You can view the recorded videos (.MOV) by taking the memory card out of the dash cam & playing the content in compatible device or playback on the 3'' LCD screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its a great little dashcam. Has cameras in front and back which I really like. Not alot of money to spend on one. But it works well. Highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I wish the IR was on the front too.
reviews.reviewText: Works and looks good for what it is. Now I don't need to run a second camera wire to the back window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works, but not durable.
reviews.reviewText: This camera works well and takes good videos. However after a couple of weeks the heat inside the vehicle caused the adhesive holding the screen to camera to fail. With no clear way to reattach the screen, I returned it for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: That camera is actually a good camera overall, I have nothing bad to say about, it's a plug and play camera the control are easy to operate a toggle through I love the screen in screen design for the interior camera the wide view and also the night vision is pretty clear as well, awesome camera⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.reviewerName: Broke in less than a month. Shorted out lcd burned out.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap easy to break
reviews.reviewText: Dash cam broke immediately. Shorted out lcd burned out. Wouldn't turn on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It didn't work the way it was supposed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for a great product.
reviews.reviewText: You cannot go wrong with this. Item was in pristine condition and worked perfectly. Set up is super easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Set Up and Operate
reviews.reviewText: Getting the initial settings set up was easy/intuitive with settings buttons on the front of the camera and clearly marked. (Can't say that for another brand dashcam I owned, it was a mess). Nice, wide-angled front and occupant cameras. Comes on when it's supposed to, shuts down when it's supposed to. I did have to buy another/longer power cord to install the camera in my Ford F350 pickup, but I anticipated that. The suction cup mount with the adhesive cord holders keep the camera securely mounted. However, I wish the mount was configured/articulated differently to provide more flexible mounting options. As it is, I have to mount it kind of low on the windshield so it doesn't pick up the edge of the rear-view mirror or the blacked-out area at the top of the windshield. The camera itself, though, is top notch. Very pleased with it.
